summary: A comprehensive unit test suite that validates the parsing, construction, and error handling of various RTCP packet types, including sender reports, receiver reports, source descriptions, BYE messages, feedback packets, and compound packets, while checking for version compliance, padding, and truncated data scenarios.
business_intent: Guarantee robust and standards‑compliant RTCP packet processing for real‑time communication or streaming applications, reducing bugs and ensuring reliable session control and feedback mechanisms.
